sourcesContent:
import{Component} from '@angular/core'; import { IProduct } from '../services/IProduct'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector:'app-admin', templateUrl:'./admin.component.html', styleUrls:['./admin.component.css'] }) export class AdminComponent{ newProduct:IProduct={ productid:0, productname:'', productprice:0, productdesc:'', prodimg:'', productcategory:'', availableqty:0 } private url="http://localhost:8080"; constructor(private http:HttpClient){} addProduct():void{ this.http.post(`${this.url}/products/add`,this.newProduct).subscribe(()=>{ alert("Product added successfully"); }); } }
